[blockly](./blockly.md) &gt; [RenderedConnection](./blockly.renderedconnection_class.md)

## RenderedConnection class

Class for a connection between blocks that may be rendered on screen.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class RenderedConnection extends Connection implements IContextMenu, IFocusableNode 
```
**Extends:** [Connection](./blockly.connection_class.md)

**Implements:** [IContextMenu](./blockly.icontextmenu_interface.md)<!-- -->, [IFocusableNode](./blockly.ifocusablenode_interface.md)

## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [canBeFocused()](./blockly.renderedconnection_class.canbefocused_1_method.md) |  | See IFocusableNode.canBeFocused. |
|  [closest(maxLimit, dxy)](./blockly.renderedconnection_class.closest_1_method.md) |  | Find the closest compatible connection to this connection. All parameters are in workspace units. |
|  [connect\_(childConnection)](./blockly.renderedconnection_class.connect__1_method.md) | <code>protected</code> | Connect two connections together. This is the connection on the superior block. Rerender blocks as needed. |
|  [disconnectInternal(setParent)](./blockly.renderedconnection_class.disconnectinternal_1_method.md) |  | Disconnect two blocks that are connected by this connection. |
|  [distanceFrom(otherConnection)](./blockly.renderedconnection_class.distancefrom_1_method.md) |  | Returns the distance between this connection and another connection in workspace units. |
|  [getFocusableElement()](./blockly.renderedconnection_class.getfocusableelement_1_method.md) |  | See IFocusableNode.getFocusableElement. |
|  [getFocusableTree()](./blockly.renderedconnection_class.getfocusabletree_1_method.md) |  | See IFocusableNode.getFocusableTree. |
|  [getOffsetInBlock()](./blockly.renderedconnection_class.getoffsetinblock_1_method.md) |  | Get the offset of this connection relative to the top left of its block. |
|  [getSourceBlock()](./blockly.renderedconnection_class.getsourceblock_1_method.md) |  | Get the source block for this connection. |
|  [highlight()](./blockly.renderedconnection_class.highlight_1_method.md) |  | Add highlighting around this connection. |
|  [isHighlighted()](./blockly.renderedconnection_class.ishighlighted_1_method.md) |  | Returns true if this connection is highlighted, false otherwise. |
|  [moveBy(dx, dy)](./blockly.renderedconnection_class.moveby_1_method.md) |  | Change the connection's coordinates. |
|  [moveTo(x, y)](./blockly.renderedconnection_class.moveto_1_method.md) |  | Change the connection's coordinates. |
|  [moveToOffset(blockTL)](./blockly.renderedconnection_class.movetooffset_1_method.md) |  | Move this connection to the location given by its offset within the block and the location of the block's top left corner. |
|  [onCheckChanged\_()](./blockly.renderedconnection_class.oncheckchanged__1_method.md) | <code>protected</code> | Function to be called when this connection's compatible types have changed. |
|  [onNodeBlur()](./blockly.renderedconnection_class.onnodeblur_1_method.md) |  | See IFocusableNode.onNodeBlur. |
|  [onNodeFocus()](./blockly.renderedconnection_class.onnodefocus_1_method.md) |  | See IFocusableNode.onNodeFocus. |
|  [respawnShadow\_()](./blockly.renderedconnection_class.respawnshadow__1_method.md) | <code>protected</code> | Respawn the shadow block if there was one connected to the this connection. Render/rerender blocks as needed. |
|  [setCheck(check)](./blockly.renderedconnection_class.setcheck_1_method.md) |  | Change a connection's compatibility. Rerender blocks as needed. |
|  [setOffsetInBlock(x, y)](./blockly.renderedconnection_class.setoffsetinblock_1_method.md) |  | Set the offset of this connection relative to the top left of its block. |
|  [showContextMenu(e)](./blockly.renderedconnection_class.showcontextmenu_1_method.md) |  | Handles showing the context menu when it is opened on a connection. Note that typically the context menu can't be opened with the mouse on a connection, because you can't select a connection. But keyboard users may open the context menu with a keyboard shortcut. |
|  [startTrackingAll()](./blockly.renderedconnection_class.starttrackingall_1_method.md) |  | Start tracking this connection, as well as all down-stream connections on any block attached to this connection. This happens when a block is expanded. |
|  [targetBlock()](./blockly.renderedconnection_class.targetblock_1_method.md) |  | Returns the block that this connection connects to. |
|  [unhighlight()](./blockly.renderedconnection_class.unhighlight_1_method.md) |  | Remove the highlighting around this connection. |
